mapper.insert: INSERT INTO protectboard (protectboard_userno , protectboardno , protectboard_title , protectboard_content , breeds , protectboard_ani_category , protectboard_reg_date , protectstatus , starttime , deadline , fileAttached) VALUES (#{protectboard_userno} , #{protectboardno} , #{protectboard_title} , #{protectboard_content} , #{breeds} , #{protectboard_ani_category} , now() , #{protectstatus} , now() ,#{deadline} , #{fileAttached} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM protectboard WHERE protectboard_userno = #{protectboard_userno} and protectboardno = #{protectboardno}
mapper.select: SELECT protectboardno FROM protectboard WHERE protectboard_userno = #{protectboard_userno} ORDER BY protectboardno DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT u.id, p.protectboard_userno , p.protectboardno , p.protectboard_title , p.protectboard_content , p.breeds , p.protectboard_ani_category , p.protectboard_reg_date , p.protectstatus , p.starttime , p.deadline , p.fileAttached FROM users u, protectboard p, mypage m WHERE u.userno = m.mypage_userno AND m.mypage_userno = #{userno} AND m.mypage_protectboardno = p.protectboardno
